Title: Azure VM Manager
Description: Azure Vm Manager is a desktop-style GUI application build with Windows Presentation Foundation. It is intended to provide a convent  way to manage AzureVMs.
HomeWiki:
The Azure VM manager will give Windows Azure Virtual Machine users a GUI for:
  • Stopping and starting Windows Services VMs
  • Viewing SQL Databases Running on Windows Azure VMs
  • Stoping and starting VMs on a schedule
  • Attaching a data disk to a VM.
